answers.a: Unrelated: Patent Blue V (E131) is a synthetic triphenylmethane blue dye used to color foods; it’s permitted with restrictions in the EU but not approved for use in U.S. foods.
Unrelated: Patent Blue V (E131) is a synthetic triphenylmethane blue dye used to color foods; it’s permitted with restrictions in the EU but not approved for use in U.S. foods.
In food additives, Sky Blue is a synonym for Patent Blue V (E131), a synthetic dye used to give foods a vivid blue color.
No one owns Patent Blue V (E131); it’s a generic color additive produced by multiple manufacturers and regulated by authorities in each country.

answers.q: what is blue sky social media
answers.a: Unrelated to E131: Patent Blue V (also called Sky Blue) is a synthetic food colorant and has no connection to social media platforms.
